titles.title: A bill to amend title IV, of the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977, to encourage the mining and reclamation of previously mined areas by active mining operations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14503-14504)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Amends the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to grant a credit for coal mining reclamation fees (as an incentive for commercial coal mine operators to remine previously mined lands) in certain circumstances.
